EmailTemplate.subject: Will you join us at VMworld?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/product-3/why-turbonomic/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Many of the worldâ€™s most influential corporations, including over 100 of the Fortune 500, have turned to Turbonomic to navigate their Digital Transformation journeys.
Our AI-driven workload automation platform spans on-premises virtualized data centers, public clouds and emerging container environments to assure application performance, enforce business policies, and drive dramatic cost efficiencies.
Stop by booth #1634 to learn how you and your organization can achieve harmony, peace, and balance with Turbonomic.
We hope to see you there!
Regards, Kristen
